findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude addresses list from the fee, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long list.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges that can be exploited if the owner is not renounced, including changing router addresses, excluding from fees, changing fees and fee receivers, modifying swapTokensAtAmount value, maxTransactionAmount, adding automatedMarketMakerPairs addresses, blacklisting addresses, and altering delayedBlocks.
